createAccessCode.title: Create access code
createAccessCode.introduction: Use this form to create an access code every time you want to give someone access to Bloom.
createAccessCode.courseResultLink: Please tell the user to go to
createAccessCode.courseResultPassword: They can use their email address and the password
createAccessCode.therapyResultLink: Please tell the user to go to
createAccessCode.therapyResultCode: They can use their email address and the access code

form.featuresLabel: Select support type offered to this user

errors.featureRequired: Select a support type before creating an access code

accessGuard.title: Access required
accessGuard.introduction: Your account does not include access to partner pages. If this doesn't seem right, <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink>.
